text: Here is a pure Python-specific design question:

code:
class MyClass(object):
    ...
    def get_my_attr(self):
        ...

    def set_my_attr(self, value):
        ...

class MyClass(object):
    ...        
    @property
    def my_attr(self):
        ...

    @my_attr.setter
    def my_attr(self, value):
        ...

text: One can encouter both approaches, but it looks like the getters/setters still prevail.
Python lets us to do it either way.
If you would design a Python program, which approach would you use and why?
